parameters.name: ApiId
parameters.description: The ID of the API. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: AppOwnerId
parameters.description: The Alibaba Cloud account of the app owner.

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the API group. This ID is generated by the system and globally unique.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: StageName
parameters.description:
The name of the runtime environment. Valid values:

*   **RELEASE**
*   **TEST**
